page.title: 04Waltham St. Lawrence Church
page.content:
{Saint Lawrence's Church}is in the middle of Waltham St Lawrence. It is a very old church which was mentioned in the{Domesday Book}.
The church was built with {flint, {stone and brick}. It has a tower at the west end which has a clock on it. There are bells in the tower which are rung for services and on special occasions like weddings.
At the entrance to the church yard there is a large {Yew tree}and a lych gate. The{Lych Gate}is a roofed gate where the coffin and its bearers could wait for the arrival of the clergyman for a funeral.
Outside the church is the{pound}which was used to keep stray animals. There are four ash trees in the pound.
